subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort was built by Raja Mansingh I?
question_hi: राजा मंसिंगी एक्सेन ने किस प्रमोजन किया?
explanation_en: Amber Fort was built by Raja Mansingh I. Raja Mansingh I was the Maharaja of Jaipur and constructed the Amber Fort as his capital city.
explanation_hi: राजा मन्सिंगी अमेर फोट ने ख़ाना गृहर फोट की बना। ख़ाना गृहर सी मैंगी के महाराज़ा गृहर की बना।

subject: Rajasthan History

question_en: Which tribe did Rajasthan belong to before the arrival of the Rajputs?
question_hi: राजपुत्तवाने बैट्र के पूर्वाने बैट कैट्र
